verses.text: Meanwhile, \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* shepherding \w the|strong="H4872"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w father-in-law|strong="H2859"\w* \w Jethro|strong="H3503"\w*, \w the|strong="H4872"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*. \w He|strong="H4872"\w* \w led|strong="H5090"\w* \w the|strong="H4872"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H4872"\w* far side \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H4872"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Horeb|strong="H2722"\w*, \w the|strong="H4872"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* God.

\w There|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* blazing fire \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w within|strong="H8432"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bush|strong="H5572"\w*. Moses \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w bush|strong="H5572"\w* \w ablaze|strong="H1197"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* fire, \w but|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H8432"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H7200"\w* \w consumed|strong="H1197"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* thought, “\w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H5493"\w* over \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w marvelous|strong="H1419"\w* \w sight|strong="H4758"\w*. \w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w bush|strong="H5572"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w burning|strong="H1197"\w* \w up|strong="H7200"\w*?”

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w gone|strong="H3068"\w* \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w look|strong="H7200"\w*, \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w within|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w bush|strong="H5572"\w*, “\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*!” “\w Here|strong="H2009"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3588"\w* answered.

“Do \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w come|strong="H7126"\w* \w any|strong="H3588"\w* closer,” God said. “\w Take|strong="H5975"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w sandals|strong="H5275"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w where|strong="H4725"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H7272"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w ground|strong="H4725"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H4872"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* said, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w the|strong="H6440"\w* God \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* father, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* God \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Abraham, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* God \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* God \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.” \w At|strong="H6440"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w*, \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H4872"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w look|strong="H5027"\w* \w at|strong="H6440"\w* God.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w*, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w indeed|strong="H3588"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w crying|strong="H6818"\w* \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w oppressors|strong="H5065"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w aware|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w sufferings|strong="H4341"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w rescue|strong="H5337"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4713"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w land|strong="H4725"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w spacious|strong="H7342"\w* \w land|strong="H4725"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H4725"\w* \w flowing|strong="H2100"\w* \w with|strong="H2100"\w* \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*—\w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w home|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, Amorites, \w Perizzites|strong="H6522"\w*, \w Hivites|strong="H2340"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w cry|strong="H6818"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* reached \w Me|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w how|strong="H2009"\w* severely \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4713"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w oppressing|strong="H3905"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H6258"\w*, \w go|strong="H3212"\w*! \w I|strong="H6258"\w* am \w sending|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w My|strong="H7971"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* asked \w God|strong="H4310"\w*, “\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* am \w I|strong="H3588"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*?”

“\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*,” \w God|strong="H7971"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w*, “\w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sign \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*: \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w worship|strong="H5647"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w*, “Suppose \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*, ‘\w The|strong="H7971"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* fathers \w has|strong="H3478"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w*,’ \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H4100"\w* ask \w me|strong="H7971"\w*, ‘\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w His|strong="H7971"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*?’ \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* tell \w them|strong="H7971"\w*?”

\w God|strong="H7971"\w* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “\w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w AM|strong="H1961"\w* \w WHO|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w AM|strong="H1961"\w*. \w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*: ‘\w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w AM|strong="H1961"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w*.’”

\w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* told \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “\w Say|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, ‘\w The|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* fathers—\w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Abraham, \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*—\w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w*.’ \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* how \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w remembered|strong="H2143"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w every|strong="H1755"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*.

\w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, assemble \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*, ‘\w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* fathers—\w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Abraham, \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*—\w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* said: \w I|strong="H4714"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H6485"\w* \w attended|strong="H6485"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H6485"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w And|strong="H2461"\w* \w I|strong="H4714"\w* \w have|strong="H4714"\w* promised \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* \w you|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H2100"\w* \w of|strong="H5927"\w* \w your|strong="H5927"\w* \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w* \w in|strong="H5927"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* land \w of|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, Amorites, \w Perizzites|strong="H6522"\w*, \w Hivites|strong="H2340"\w*, \w and|strong="H2461"\w* \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*—\w a|strong="H3068"\w* land \w flowing|strong="H2100"\w* \w with|strong="H2100"\w* \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* \w and|strong="H2461"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*.’

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w what|strong="H6963"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w say|strong="H6963"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w must|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w tell|strong="H8085"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, ‘\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w*, \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w met|strong="H7136"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w*. \w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w take|strong="H3212"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* three-day \w journey|strong="H1870"\w* \w into|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w so|strong="H6258"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.’

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w allow|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w unless|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w mighty|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* compels \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w stretch|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w strike|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4713"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wonders|strong="H6381"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w perform|strong="H6213"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*. \w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w after|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w*, \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w release|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3212"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w such|strong="H2088"\w* \w favor|strong="H2580"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4713"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w leave|strong="H5414"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w away|strong="H3212"\w* \w empty-handed|strong="H7387"\w*.

\w Every|strong="H7760"\w* \w woman|strong="H1323"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7934"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w any|strong="H7760"\w* \w woman|strong="H1323"\w* \w staying|strong="H1481"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w jewelry|strong="H3627"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w clothing|strong="H8071"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*. \w So|strong="H7760"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w plunder|strong="H5337"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4713"\w*.”
